card_description: Enhance Commit: Add the top card of your discard pile to your card pool. This attack gets +2 or -2 damage.
Deadlock First Enhance Commit: Double your Weapon attack’s speed and damage.
Enhance: Add 1 asset or Weapon foundation from your discard pile to your card pool or hand.
Form [Once per turn] Permanently reduce your character’s hand size by 1: Draw 3 cards.
Enhance Commit: Your Fury or Punch attack gains Powerful: X. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
"Powerful: X - Enhance Discard 1 or more momentum: This attack gets +X damage for each momentum used to pay the cost of this ability."
Combo Enhance: This attack gains Stun: 2.
Enhance: Build 1 foundation from your card pool face up.
"Combo (___) - This attacks's Combo Enhance cannot be played unless the card immediately preceding it matches the requirement in parenthesis."
Enhance: This attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if this attack has received a speed bonus.
Deadlock Enhance: Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum.
"EX: X - Enhance Discard 1 or more momentum: This attack gets +X speed for each momentum used to pay the cost of this ability."
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Add up to 3 cards from your hand to your momentum.
All Might Enhance Permanently reduce your character’s hand size by 1: Draw 3 cards.
Enhance: If this attack deals damage, build the next foundation you play face up.
Enhance: If a Punch attack has dealt damage this turn, draw 1 card.
Response: After your rival commits 1 or more foundations during this attack’s Enhance Step, it gets +1 speed.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the speed of this attack minus 3.
Combo Enhance: The next 2 Weapon cards you try to play this turn ignore progressive difficulty.
Enhance: Draw 1 card for each foundation in your card pool.
Enhance: If this attack is blocked, your rival flips 1 foundation.
Enhance [Once per turn] Discard the top 5 cards of your deck: Add 1 copy of “Summon Dark Shadow” from your discard pile to your hand.
Enhance: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage. Only playable while committed.
Enhance: Your next Kick attack this turn gets +2 speed and +2 damage.
Enhance: Draw 1 card.
Response Flip: After 1 of your foundations is removed or destroyed, build the top card of your deck face down.
Enhance Commit, discard 1 card: Draw 1 card.
Combo Enhance: This attack gets +4 damage.
Enhance Discard 1 card: Your next attack this turn gets +4 damage.
While this card is in your card pool, your attacks get +1 speed and +1 damage.
Enhance: Your next check to play a card this turn gets +3. Commit your character.
Enhance Flip: Draw 1 card. If this was not the first Enhance played this Enhance Step, discard 1 card.
Enhance Destroy: End this Enhance Step.
Enhance Destroy: Return this non-Charge attack to its printed damage.
If you have 10 or less health, this card gets -1 difficulty.

Enhance: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck and add all attacks revealed this way to your hand. Discard the remaining cards and your rival loses 1 health for each card discarded this way. This effect cannot reduce your rival below 1 health.
Enhance Flip: Reduce your attack’s speed to 0. Your next attack gets +2 speed. Your next check to play a card gets +1.
Enhance: If your first attack this Combat Phase was blocked, this attack gets +1 damage.
Response [Once per turn]: After your non-Throw attack deals damage, your rival loses 5 health.
Response Commit: After you completely block an attack, your rival destroys 1 ready foundation.
Response: After you build this card, unflip 1 foundation.
Enhance Flip: This attack gets +3 speed. Only playable if this attack’s speed is less than its printed speed.
Enhance [Your turn] Discard the top card of your deck: This attack gets +1 damage.
Endeavor / Todoroki Form Remove: If you have 10 or fewer cards in your deck, draw 2 cards.
[All] Response: After your Combat Phase begins, reveal the top card of your deck.
Deadlock Form Flip: Look at your rival’s hand.
Enhance: Actions in your card pool do not count towards progressive difficulty for the rest of this turn.
Enhance: If this attack has received a speed and damage bonus, it gets +3 damage and gains
Stun: 1.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Your Punch attack gets +3 damage.
Enhance Commit: This attack gets +1 or -2 speed. If it is blocked, the next attack gets +1 or -1 speed.
Enhance: If your rival has not played a block this turn, this attack gets +1 speed.
Enhance: If this is your first attack this turn, it gets +1 damage.
Enhance Commit: Discard any number of cards and draw 1 card for each card discarded.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 or -1 speed for each of its keywords. Playable while committed.
Combo Enhance Lose 2 Health: Add 1 copy of "Relentless Barrage” from your discard pile to your hand.
Enhance: If this attack is blocked, your next attack this turn gets +2 damage.
Enhance Flip: If this attack's speed is at least double its printed speed, it gets +2 or -2 damage.
Response: After you block with this card, add it to your hand during the End Phase.
Enhance Discard the top 2 cards of your deck: If this attack's damage is 8 or more, it gets +3 speed.
Enhance: Add 1 action from your discard pile to your card pool.
Deadlock Enhance: Your rival loses 1 health for each Ally card in your card pool.
"Deadlock - This ability may only played if your rival has more than 10 foundations in their stage."
Response: After you build this card, build 1 foundation from your hand committed.
Response Commit, flip: After you check a foundation, add it to your hand.
While this card is in your card pool, rival checks to play foundations get -1.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 speed and +1 damage.
When you attempt to block with this card, return your rival’s attack to its printed speed and zone.

Enhance: This card does not count toward progressive difficulty for the rest of this turn.
Asui/Tokoyami Enhance: Ready 1 card in your stage that has not been readied this Combat Phase.
Response Flip: After you commit any number of cards due to your rival’s effect, build the top card of your deck face down. Playable while committed.
Response [Once per turn] Discard 1 card: After an attack is played, draw 1 card. This attack gets +2 speed. If you discarded an attack, it gets +4 speed instead.
Enhance: If this attack's speed is at least double its printed speed, it gets +2 or -2 damage.
Enhance: If the next attack you play this turn is a High attack, it gets +3 speed. If the next attack you play this turn is a Mid attack, it gets +3 damage.
Enhance: If the next attack you play this turn is a Mid attack, it gets +3 speed.

Response: After you block with this card, your rival's next attack this turn gets -2 damage.

Enhance Flip: Look at the top card of your deck.
Deadlock Enhance Commit: If a card has left your card pool this turn, add 1 Ranged attack from your discard pile to your hand.
Enhance: The next time your rival loses health this Combat Phase, they lose 1 health and you gain 1 health.
Deadlock Enhance: Your rival loses 2 health.
[Order] First Enhance: Both players remove foundations in their stage until they each have 5. End this Enhance Step.

have no cards in your hand, draw 2 cards.

This attack cannot be completely blocked.
